sentences.en: Brad, did you enjoy your trip to Thailand?
sentences.cn: 布莱德, 你去泰国旅游愉快 吗 ?

sentences.en: During vacation, we're going to travel to the north of Thailand.
sentences.cn: 在假期中, 我们将要去泰国的北部旅行.

sentences.en: He first searched for remains of early man in Jehol, then in Thailand.
sentences.cn: 他先在热河省, 后来又在泰国寻找早期人类的化石遗存.

sentences.en: He visited Thailand and Singapore to tout for investment.
sentences.cn: 他访问了泰国与新加坡，以期招揽投资。

sentences.en: I went to Thailand for vacation.
In Thailand rice is an important commodity for export.
sentences.cn: 米是泰国的一项重要出口商品.

sentences.en: My stay in Thailand has certainly been the experience of my life.
sentences.cn: 我在泰国的日子真的是我生命之中的一种经历.

sentences.en: Susan and Liam are in Thailand.
Thailand could be adaptable in its dealing with distant empires.
sentences.cn: 泰国与远方的帝国打交道时可以应付裕如.

sentences.en: Thailand exports its fine rices around the world.
sentences.cn: 泰国将精米出口到世界各地。

sentences.en: Thailand is at its most vibrant during the New Year celebrations.
sentences.cn: 在欢度新年期间，泰国举国欢腾。

sentences.en: Thailand is on the west of Laos.
Thailand, Brazil and India each have a carrier, while the US has eleven.
sentences.cn: 泰国，巴西，和印度，每个国家都有航母，而美国有十一艘。

sentences.en: The last offensive drove thousands of people into Thailand.
sentences.cn: 最后一次进攻将成千上万的人赶到了泰国。

sentences.en: What really sets Mr Thaksin apart is that he comes from northern Thailand.
sentences.cn: 他信先生真正与众不同之处是他来自泰国北部。
